title: Trump calls Democrats during State of the Union speech as "treasonous"
text:
Trump calls Democrats during State of the Union speech as "treasonous" Monday, February 05, 2018 - 01:50 
U.S. President Donald Trump, touting tax reform at Sheffer Corporation in Cincinnati, Ohio on Monday took aim at Democrats during his State of the Union address last week, calling those who did not applaud when he announced figures on minority unemployment as ''treasonous'' and ''un-American.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
